name: Eldritch Earthbound
description:
Outcast and downtrodden, you know have traded on dark secrets out of desperation for a leg up in this cruel world.

“Freak” is a cruel word, used to separate you from the others. And separated you are. Baseless rumors abound. Not all earthbound are cursed, diseased, or foul. And in fact very few have actually traded their soul for terrible secrets and power. You, however, have. Not that it’s anyone business. Desperate situations call for desperate measures, and no one was helping you in these dire times.  No one but your secrets.
This optional class for MÖRK BORG allows a player to start play as an earthbound outcast with a terrible secret. Requires: MÖRK BORG core book. Thanks to @bobbytries for Sensitivity Reading!

Dev-log
  • Released v 1.0.0
